item.title: Building a Smart Python Code Autocomplete Chatbot with Semantic Search and RAG
item.description:
Introduction
#

Traditional code search tools rely heavily on exact keyword matching, often returning irrelevant or overly generic results that fail to capture the semantic intent of a developer’s query. This project proposes a modern alternative: a chatbot that bridges natural language queries with semantically relevant and contextually adapted Python code snippets using retrieval-augmented generation (RAG).

By combining semantic search (via MiniLM + FAISS) with generative refinement (via GPT-3.5-turbo), our system allows developers to describe their coding intentions in plain English and receive both retrieved and synthesized code suggestions in real time.
